# Location Management Domain Agent Contract

**Agent Name:** location-domain-agent  
**Domain:** Location  
**Authority Level:** Final on spatial semantics

## The Story Authoring Agent MAY
- Reference physical/logical locations

## The Story Authoring Agent MUST ASK WHEN
- Cross-location transfers occur
- Ownership differs by location
- Time zones matter

## The Story Authoring Agent MUST NOT
- Assume geo-hierarchies
- Invent regional policy
